testcase.name: NL.BR-KVK-4.12
testcase.description: For a corrected annual report, an annual report to be corrected MUST be filed with the Trade Register.

variation.name: Invalid Adoption Status
variation.description: The instance has a 'kvk-i:DocumentResubmissionDueToUnsurmountableInaccuracies' value of 'Ja' (Yes), but not a 'jenv-bw2-i:DocumentAdoptionStatus' value of 'Ja' (Yes).
